```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

source("../scripts/helpers.r")

df <- readxl::read_excel("../data/raw_data/u03123_Data_OSF.xlsx")


df
```

```{r}
u03123_mod_z_1 <- df %>% 
  lm(z(SESxSchool) ~ z(Year),.)


export_ols(u03123_mod_z_1, 
           key_effects = "z(Year)")
```

```{r}
df %<>% 
  dplyr::mutate(
    dec_diff = Highest_SES_Decile - Lowest_SES_Decile
  )

u03123_mod_z_2 <- df %>% 
  dplyr::filter(SESxSchool_N > 1000) %>% 
  lm(z(dec_diff) ~ z(Year),.)



export_ols(u03123_mod_z_2, 
           key_effects = "z(Year)")
```
